subject: Dog Sledding
Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
lead_paragraph: When Lance Mackey crossed the finish line in Nome, Alaska, he became the only musher in the 38-year history of the Iditarod to win four consecutive races.
snippet: When Lance Mackey crossed the finish line in Nome, Alaska, he became the only musher in the 38-year history of the Iditarod to win four consecutive races.
